Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT to PC71BM ratio in TCB solutions |
| Maximum EQE in TCB solutions |

Note: "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM" are assumed to be material names, but since they are used in the context of a ratio describing a material property, they are considered valid entities. "TCB solutions" is a solution or mixture of materials, so it can be considered a material property.
